original_text: I have a record of Ephraim's sin. Ephraim's people will certainly receive their punishment. I have a record of Ephraim's sin. Ephraim's people will certainly receive their punishment. I have a record of Ephraim's sin. Ephraim's people will certainly receive their punishment. I have a record of Ephraim's sin.
korean_text: 에브라임의 불의가 봉함되었고 그 죄가 저장되었나니

sentences.original_text: I have a record of Ephraim's sin.
Ephraim's people will certainly receive their punishment.
sentences.korean_translation: 에브라임 백성들은 반드시 그 벌을 받으리라.
